name: burgeon-adaire
description: PT. Burgeon Adaire International thrives in a dynamic landscape, offering insights and opportunities while building strong partnerships and consistently delivering exceptional value.

scripts.s3: aws s3 rm s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compiled --recursive && aws s3 rm s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compressed --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/compiled s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compiled --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/compiled s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compiled --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/assets/images s3://burgeonadaire-storage --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/assets/videos s3://burgeonadaire-storage/videos --recursive && aws s3 cp ./compressed s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compressed --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/configurations s3://burgeonadaire-storage --recursive
scripts.s3-light: aws s3 rm s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compiled --recursive && aws s3 rm s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compressed --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/compiled s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compiled --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/compiled s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compiled --recursive && aws s3 cp ./compressed s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compressed --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/configurations s3://burgeonadaire-storage --recursive
scripts.build:ssr:dev: npm run build:client:dev && npm run build:server:dev
scripts.build:ssr:prod: npm run build:client:prod && npm run build:server:prod
scripts.start:ssr:dev: concurrently "npm run build:server:dev && nodemon --exec babel-node src/server/index.js"  "npm run build:client:dev -- --watch"
scripts.start:ssr:prod: concurrently "npm run build:server:prod && nodemon --exec babel-node src/server/index.js"  "npm run build:client:prod -- --watch"

author: PT. Burgeon Adaire International
